description.value: When Testing Medicae, may spend a fate point to restore damage to a target equal to WP Bonus or WP Bonus + Int Bonus if Lightly Wounded, or alternatively to remove all Fatigue from 2xWP people. May Burn a Fate point to allow a recently dead character to instead be critically wounded, within reason, you can't undecapitate someone.

specialAbilities.name: Divine Healing
specialAbilities.description: Spend Fate Point during Medicae test to restore WP Bonus damage (or WP+Int if lightly wounded), or remove all Fatigue from 2xWP people.

specialAbilities.name: Resurrection
specialAbilities.description: Burn a Fate Point to save a recently dead character, making them critically wounded instead (within reason).
